P.SPAN: Enter a unique and meaningful name for the scenario.
Select the AOI you wish to use with this scenario.
Included by default, the tool loads the NED Slope essential data layer. This layer is used by the suitability model to deter me the percent change in elevation.

Included by default, the tool loads the National Land Cover essential data layer. This layer is used by the suitability model to determine the type of land cover (e.g., rock, mixed forest, grassland, etc.).
Included by default, the tool loads the National Hydrography Dataset essential data layer. This layer is used by the suitability model to determine the distance from water.
Specify a grid size for use in the analysis that is different than the default grid size used.
Included by default, the tool loads the TNM Roads essential data layer. This layer is used by the suitability model to determine the distance from roads.
Specify a grid size for use in the analysis that is different than the default grid size used.
Included by default, the tool loads the Esri SSURGO essential data layer. This layer is used by the suitability model to determine the soil infiltration based on the hydrologic soil group.
Specify a grid size for use in the analysis that is different than the default grid size used.
Optionally, add any relevant notes to describe the scenario.
